title: MD
biography: Venkatraman Ramakrishnan is a British-American structural biologist. He shared the 2009 Nobel Prize in Chemistry with Thomas A. Steitz and Ada Yonath for research on the structure and function of ribosomes.
aiSummary: Venkatraman Ramakrishnan is a molecular medicine - protein synthesis mechanisms specialist with an H-index of 110 at UK/India collaborations (Faculty). Has been published in Proceedings of the Indian Academy of Sciences - Section A, Nature biomedical engineering, The Lancet. Neurology. Based in India.
